item.title: Serverless AWS Lambda Examples
item.author: yrong@ustc.edu (Ronyang)
item.description: Read this on the main serverless docs site Serverless AWS Lambda Examples Have an example? Submit a PR or open an issue. ⚡️ Example Runtime Aws Auth0 Api Gateway Demonstration of protecting API gateway endpoints with auth0 nodeJS Env Variables Encrypted In A File Serverless example managing secrets in an encrypted file nodeJS Serverless Node Env Variables This example demonstrates how to use environment variables for AWS Lambdas.
